ComicInfo.Penciller: Al Feldstein,George Roussos,Jack Kamen,Joe Orlando,Max Elkan,Wally Wood,Joe Orlando,Wally Wood,Jack Kamen,Max Elkan,George Roussos,Al Feldstein
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Man's Job!: The world changes when the first woman president is elected.
The Die Is Cast!: The I.S.E.A. of Earth has commissioned Commander Stone to write out a detailed report on the destruction of his spaceship. What he tells about is almost too hard to believe.
A Lesson in Anatomy!!: Chased away from his father's lab while he dissects a body, Stevey finds a stranger in the forest. Wanting to brag, Stevey tells the man all sorts of falsehoods, which he believes. But Stevey soon learns a secret about the stranger he doesn't expect to discover.
Project... Survival!: With a civil war raging on Earth, the President of the Amalgamated Rocket Corporation believes, that with the help of science, man can reach the Moon and use it as a base.
The Thing in the Jar: Scientists discover what has been killing everything in Mr. Dorsey's pond.
The 10th at Noon: Two scientists invent a time machine that can send a camera into the future and snap a picture, and, by doing so, they discover the end of the world is coming.
Shrinking from Abuse!: Hugo Masterson has created a formula to shrink tissue to cure cancer, but he accidentally injects himself.
The Two-Century Journey!: A generation ship leaves earth to travel to another planet. On the way they discover that people age very slowly in space, which creates a population problem on the ship.
Not on the Menu: A ship is forced to land on a planet and wait three months for its engine to recharge, but they only have food for two months.
The Mutants!: People who were witnesses to the explosion of the first hydrogen bomb at Eniwetok in July of 1952 grimly discover a year later that children being born to them are weird mutations that have the intellect of normal adult humans.
A Timely Shock!: Steven is struck by lightning and when he comes to he meets a beautiful woman.
The Secret of Saturn's Ring!: A rocket ship crew arrive at Saturn's ring, made up of moonlets, and Stinton and Gentry's job is to study these up close by landing on one of them.
A Mistake in Multiplication: An Earth spaceship discovers an alien spaceship with aliens in suspended animation.
The Connection: Thomas rents an apartment from Doris.
The Duplicates: Lee and Robert make a duplicator, then decide to make a duplicate of the girl they both love.
Spawn of Mars: Jean was excited to be the first woman to set foot on the planet Mars.
The Enemies of the Colony: Members of the G.C.A. land on a planet after seven years of travel, intent on making it their new home.
The Slave Ship: Captain Jorkin commands a slave ship illegally bringing slaves to America.
It Didn't Matter: Arnold is hired by Dr. Caldwell to help him build a matter-transporter.
The Origin of the Species!: Ernest Revere believes the ancestors of man came from space and goes on a space expedition to find it.
Breakdown!: Mary takes her husband to see the FBI Chief in Washington to report to the Chief about an invasion by monsters from outer space.
Across the Sun!: A missing Mars expedition lands back on Earth after disappearing a year earlier.
Come into My Parlor: A woman from the future has come to bring a man with her to the future.
7 Year Old Genius!: Rufus Tatum is an atomic mutant genius who knows how to create a hydrogen bomb.
